results.name: Spec Ops: Rangers Lead the Way

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Powered by Dosbox

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Modern Intel/AMD CPU 1.6GHz+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: No

  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
